name: FLATS: The Apartment Exploration Game V2
name_original: FLATS: The Apartment Exploration Game V2
description:
When you are asked to check up on your Grandmother, you notice slightly something off leading you on a path to a wild story!

FLATS is a previously worked on prototype originally created by Parastilla & BanditZois, after working on it for a more advanced prototype (and frankly a more functional one) we brought along 2 other members! https://maryysoulis.itch.io/ https://176842122.itch.io/

o check on you
